author: sichen
msg: Responding to a few comments on the list, we're changing all the category lookups from dropdown to lookup, for users who have a lot of categories this would be much more efficient

author: ekoneil
msg: Remove the "test" scope from Struts for the beehive-netui-core artifact.
This issue was reported by Niels Harremoës and addresses BEEHIVE-1170.

author: sebor
msg: * valarray (abs, acos, asin, atan, atan2, cos, cosh, exp, log,
log10, pow, sin, sinh, sqrt, tan, tanh): Replaced T() with T(0)
in order to work around a gcc 3.2.3 bug (see STDCXX-317).

author: prasad
msg: * renaming jaxb/test-ejb and jaxb/test-war to jaxb-ejb, jaxb-war
* renaming stax/test-ejb and stax/test-war to jaxb-ejb, jaxb-war

author: bravi
msg: [YOKO-245] Forgot a minor update in my earlier merge
